title: Decorative Sculpture on the Facade of Santa Maria Novella, Decorative Carving on the Doorway, Fruit and Foliage on the Right Hand Corner of the Lintel, Florence
description: spray of fruit and foliage at architectural corner; circle with ribbons at corner; mounted on two sheets, rust over light tan
creditline: Gift of Rosemary and Elliot Offner in honor of Emily Offner Hollidge
